about_the_game:
Brace yourself for an adrenaline-pumping journey through a universe ravaged by cosmic invaders, where the realms of sci-fi clash with the spine-chilling depths of eldritch horror. Cosmic Blastards is your ticket to an electrifying arcade survival shooter experience like no other.

Join the ranks of the fearless Blastards, humanity's last line of defence against relentless cosmic nightmares. Each mission thrusts you into a whirlwind of gripping lore and intense shooter action. Navigate unpredictable biomes, complete critical objectives, and secure your extraction point against overwhelming odds.

Every encounter is a heart-pounding race against time and insurmountable forces. Extraction is your lifeline. With razor-sharp strategy and lightning-fast reflexes, fight your way to safety and pave your path to victory.

Fear not defeat, for each attempt only makes you stronger. Level up your Blastards, fine-tune your arsenal, and experiment with diverse character builds to conquer the ever-changing landscapes and enemy tactics. Your ultimate goal? To ascend as the ultimate Blastard.

Key Features

  • Five Unique Playable Characters: Choose from five distinct characters, each with their own unique playstyle and abilities. Experience a converging plotline where every character's journey leads to their own distinct ending.

  • Gripping Narrative Extraction Missions: Immerse yourself in missions rich with dark lore and suspense. Plan your escape amidst relentless enemy onslaughts and unravel a compelling story that goes beyond mere survival.

  • Procedurally Generated Biomes: Each mission introduces dynamic environments, ensuring that no two missions are ever the same. Prepare for fresh challenges and surprises at every turn.

  • Character Progression and Customization: Level up your Blastards, enhance your loadout, and unlock powerful new skills. Embrace a variety of playstyles and adapt your strategy as you progress through the epic narrative.

  • Sci-Fi meets Eldritch Horror: Dive into a uniquely crafted universe where high-tech science fiction collides with the eerie and unpredictable elements of cosmic horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle time and terror in a shoot & survive extraction roguelite. Select your hero and survive the relentless cosmic surge. Shoot, level up, topple bosses, and amplify your powers to cosmic levels. Embrace the Blastard within and unlock new heroes, powers, and perks to use on future runs.

*languages with full audio support
